name: collector
description: COLLECTOR -------------------------------------- A responsive web app for managing your collection of anything you want! -------------------------------------- Basic functions 1. login with facebook 2. upload image of your newest item in your collection 3. add/update/delete details of your newest item  4. delete photo -------------------------------------- Other features - share on facebook - check if you have an item in your collection by comparing a photo/name - if you don't have a notebook, add to your wishlist - in wishlist write details about price, website, location, etc. -------------------------------------- Semantics - wordpress blog style - responsive - less text, more images - login page --> upload image/view gallery - upload image --> add post page - view gallery --> gallery page --------------------------------------
